item.description:
Interested in the recent trend toward "raw?" Curious about feeding raw to your dog (or cat)? Looking to expand your education on commercial dog food & nutrition in general? Then you'll like this FREE Seminar by Stella & Chewy's!

I recently saw this seminar myself at Pets Gone Healthy in Marlborough, MA, and while I have only rudimentary knowledge of this topic, found it very informative & eye opening about commercial dog foods in general.

I am very happy to bring it to us! Humans only, this time ;)

Cassie-Leigh Stock, ABCDT, CTDI
President & Founder
New England Bully Breed Club
http://www.nebbc.weebly.com
Owner & Head Dog Trainer/Instructor
Higher Expectations Dog Training & Behavior Modification
http://www.hexdogs.com
http://www.facebook.com
item.name: FREE Raw Feeding Seminar with Stella & Chewy's!
